Our Services

Oil & Natural Gas

We provide comprehensive legal support across the Oil & Gas sector. Key regulators include the Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas (MoPNG), the Directorate General of Hydrocarbons (DGH), and the Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board (PNGRB). These authorities oversee licensing, pricing, leases, and tariffs in the sector.

Our expertise covers drafting and vetting of Gas Sale Agreements, Sale and Purchase Agreements, Gas Transmission Agreements, Re-Gasification Agreements, Capacity Booking Agreements, LNG Swapping Agreements, and Charter Party Agreements.

We also represent clients in dispute resolution including arbitrations, and litigations before the Supreme Court, High Courts, APTEL, and PNGRB.

Energy & Natural Resources

We advise clients across the power and energy sector, including compliance with the Electricity Act, 2003 and the Energy Conservation Act, 2001.

Our services include assistance in drafting and vetting Power Purchase Agreements (PPAs) and advising generating companies and DISCOMs on a variety of electricity law issues.

We represent clients before SERC, CERC, and APTEL in regulatory and dispute resolution matters.

Indirect Taxation

Our taxation team specializes in disputes related to Central Excise, Customs, Sales Tax, and Service Tax. These matters frequently involve complex issues of classification, double taxation, and inter-state tax disputes.

The taxation law experts at Legal Minds International assist clients before the Customs, Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal (CESTAT) and before various competent authorities and commissioners.

Litigation & Arbitration

We have extensive experience in handling Civil Suits, Appeals, Criminal Matters, NI Act cases, Writs, Writ Appeals, and litigation under the Arbitration and Conciliation Act (Sections 9, 11, 34, 37).

Our team regularly conducts matters before the Supreme Court, High Courts, NCLT, NCLAT, National Green Tribunal, Consumer Forums, and other judicial forums.

We also have rich experience in conducting arbitrations involving high financial stakes before arbitral tribunals chaired by former Judges of the High Courts and the Supreme Court.

Banking, Finance & Insurance

Our banking and finance practice covers the full spectrum of domestic and international financial services, including securitization, due diligence, derivatives, restructuring, insolvency, project finance, asset finance, and insurance.

We represent clients before DRT, DRAT, IRDAI, Consumer Forums, MACT, Banking Ombudsman, and handle matters relating to dishonor of cheques under the NI Act.

Insolvency & Bankruptcy

Our partners bring rich experience in handling matters under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2017. We represent clients in proceedings before the NCLT and NCLAT.

Real Estate & Infrastructure

We advise on all aspects of real estate law, including purchase, sale, leasing, and mortgage of commercial, industrial, agricultural, and residential properties. Our services extend to compliance with stamp duty, registration, and obtaining necessary regulatory approvals.

We represent clients in land acquisition matters under the Right to Fair Compensation and Transparency in Land Acquisition Act, 2013 and the PMP Act, 1962.

In infrastructure, we provide end-to-end contract management support for large corporate projects, including drafting, review, and negotiation of multi-crore contracts.

Labour, Industrial & Service Law

We specialize in advisory and compliance across Indian labour laws, including the Industrial Disputes Act, 1947, Trade Union Act, 1926, Minimum Wages Act, 1948, Payment of Wages Act, 1936, Factories Act, 1948, Payment of Bonus Act, 1965, Equal Remuneration Act, 1976, Payment of Gratuity Act, 1972, and the Employee’s Compensation Act, 1923.

Our lawyers represent corporates before Labour Courts, Industrial Tribunals, and Commissioners on disputes involving labour relations, compliance issues, and contract labour matters.

Legal Research & Training

Legal Minds International is a pioneer in conducting training programmes, symposiums, and workshops on legal subjects relevant to various industries. Our programs are tailored for non-law executives and law department professionals alike.

A dedicated research team constantly updates our lawyers and clients on the latest legal and regulatory developments, ensuring informed decision-making and proactive compliance.
